"}</style></head><body class="doc-content" style="background-color:#ffffff;padding:72pt 72pt 72pt 72pt;max-width:468pt"><p class="title" id="h.kt2glrs6n5dh" style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:26pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;page-break-after:avoid;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="color:#000000;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:26pt;font-family:"Arial";font-style:normal">001 | Not Just Resolutions: Defining and Quantifying My Goals</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal">Welcome to my new blog, a space where I aim to share the unfiltered journey of pursuing health, financial independence, personal growth, and the delicate balance of being a stay-at-home mom. As I embark on this adventure, I want to kick things off by emphasizing that these are not just resolutions; they are tangible, quantifiable goals that I am committed to achieving, no matter how ugly it gets and how long it takes.</span></p><p class="subtitle" id="h.87e2r844du7j" style="border-right-style:solid;color:#666666;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:15pt;margin-left:72pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";margin-top:0;orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;page-break-after:avoid;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;margin-right:72pt;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;margin-bottom:0;widows:2"><span style="color:#666666;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:15pt;font-family:"Arial";font-style:normal">Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you wish to become. -- James Clear</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal">Before I get into my research, let me expand on what I want to bring to the table. There are a lot of places to go and read information. In fact, we have so much information today, that most people have to curate a small subset of data that is worth their time. My goal is not to make and set unreachable points, my `goal is to be open and honest as I make 1% changes.</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal">Beyond Resolutions, Embracing Tangible Goals</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";color:#374151;font-weight:400">As I embark on this adventure, it's not merely about resolutions; it's about carving a path toward tangible, quantifiable goals that transcend the conventional New Year's promises. The commitment I bring to these goals will be unwavering (I hope), a dedication to achieving outcomes that matter, irrespective of the obstacles encountered or the time it takes to surmount them. Even if I am not unwavering, I will be honest, and hopefully, that will teach you better ways to keep moving forward. I would love for you to join me on this journey and your readership will help keep me accountable.</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";color:#374151;font-weight:700">An Overture to </span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:italic;color:#374151;font-weight:700">Real</span><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal"> Progress</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";color:#374151;font-weight:400">This inaugural post sets the stage for what lies ahead. It's a declaration that we are diving into MY ugly and chaotic everyday life—exploring MY FUTURE ups and downs, the successes, and even the little *</span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:italic;color:#374151;font-weight:400">oopses</span><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal">* along the way. Each blog post will be one part of a much larger picture on the canvas of my pursuits.</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:700;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal">Tangible, Measurable, Achievable: A Pledge to You</span></p><p style="border-right-style:solid;color:#000000;border-top-width:0pt;font-size:11pt;border-left-style:solid;font-family:"Arial";orphans:2;text-align:left;padding:0;margin:0;border-right-width:0pt;line-height:1.15;border-left-width:0pt;border-top-style:solid;border-bottom-width:0pt;border-bottom-style:solid;widows:2"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";color:#374151;font-weight:400">I want you, my reader, to know that this is not </span><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";color:#374151;font-weight:700">just</span><span style="color:#374151;font-weight:400;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;font-size:12pt;font-family:"Roboto";font-style:normal"> about me—it's about us. Together, we'll navigate the maze of health improvements, financial milestones, personal breakthroughs, and the delicate art of harmonizing family life.
